text: Phases is a box set compiling the first eight studio albums by The Who, as well as the Live at Leeds album, in LP form. This box set was released in the United Kingdom and West Germany. ==Track listing== All albums are identical to their initial United Kingdom releases. #My Generation #A Quick One #The Who Sell Out #Tommy #Live at Leeds #Who's Next #Quadrophenia #The Who by Numbers #Who Are You ==References== Category:The Who compilation albums Category:1981 compilation albums Category:Polydor Records compilation albums
title: Phases (The Who album)
